benchmark_details.name: PatFigVQA
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce a novel visual question answering (VQA) dataset called PatFigVQA suitable to fine-tune and evaluate LVLMs in a few-shot learning scenario to close the domain gap of pre-trained LVLMs for patents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To study patent figure VQA and classification using LVLM in zero-shot and few-shot settings.

data.source: Constructed from Extended CLEF-IP 2011 and DeepPatent2 datasets.
data.size: 35,926 figures for PatFigVQA; Exact sizes for PatFigCLS not specified
data.annotation: Manual question formulation for the dataset.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on top classification performance and semantic equivalency with ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in classifying patent figures.
methodology.validation: Validation performed using specific splits on dataset.
